overview.title: Hi, I am Jayesh Hadke
overview.description: I am a Software Engineer with a passion for building innovative solutions. I specialize in full-stack development, focusing on creating efficient and scalable applications. My expertise includes ASP.NET Core, Node.js, and Android development, with a strong emphasis on user experience and performance optimization. I am also working on AI-related projects, exploring the integration of machine learning and natural language processing into applications.

experience.description:
• Designed, developed, and deployed 10+ new features in an enterprise system using ASP.NET Core, .NET Core, and Nodejs, enhancing system functionality and user experience.
• Performed root cause analysis (RCA) and debugging to resolve critical system errors, improving application stability and performance.
• Monitored and optimized application performance using New Relic (API traces, microservices monitoring), Kibana (ElasticSearch queries), and Kusto (logging), ensuring high availability and seamless operation.
• Led end-to-end release cycles, handling QC, UAT, and production deployments via Azure DevOps Pipelines, while managing client support and feature development concurrently.

Contributed to an Electronic Logging Device (ELD) project for the Canadian government, building a mobile app that integrates with the ELD system.
• Strengthened backend development skills using the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture for improved scalability and maintainability.

• Developed a gesture detection algorithm using ML Kit for an Android app integrating with Unity, enhancing user interaction.
• Gained experience in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), project management, and collaboration using GitHub for version control.

projects.name: Arithematic AI Agent
projects.description: Developed an AI agent that can solve arithmetic problems using LangGraph and LangChain. The agent utilizes the Cohere LLM model for natural language understanding and processing, enabling it to interpret and solve mathematical expressions effectively. The project also incorporates LangSmith for monitoring and debugging the agent's performance. [Note: This project is case study for understanding the working of LangGraph and LangChain, along with langsmith for monitoring]

projects.name: Gym Management System
projects.description: Developed a backend service for a gym management system using .NET Core. The service supports user authentication, membership management, and class scheduling. It includes a RESTful API for integration with the frontend.

projects.name: Youtube Backend Service
projects.description: Developed a backend service for a YouTube-like application using Node.js and Express. Using MongoDB for data storage, the service supports user authentication, video uploads, and comments. The project includes a RESTful API for seamless integration with the frontend.

projects.name: Kingdoms Kid Streaming App
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform streaming app using Flutter, allowing users to stream videos from YouTube and download resources. The app features a user-friendly interface and integrates with YouTube's API for video playback.

projects.name: Online Shopping Cross Platform App
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform shopping app using Flutter, allowing users to browse products, add them to a cart, and make purchases. The app features a user-friendly interface and integrates with payment gateways for secure transactions.

projects.name: Alarm App (Android)
projects.description: Developed an Android app that functions as an alarm clock, allowing users to set, edit, and delete alarms. The app features a user-friendly interface and integrates with the device's native alarm functionality.

projects.name: Automated Green House
projects.description: This was IOT based project which was developed using Arduino and ESP32. It is used to monitor the temperature, humidity, soil moisture and light intensity of the green house. It also has a feature to control the water pump and fan based on the readings.
